outline:
1. to tear apart or away, tear off, break away
    1. (Qal) to tear away, snatch, rescue
    2. (Piel) to tear off
    3. (Hithpael) to tear off from oneself, be broken off, be broken in pieces
kjv_def: break (off), deliver, redeem, rend (in pieces), tear in pieces.
strongs_def: to break off or crunch; figuratively, to deliver
